org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication

接口 ReplicationPeerStorage

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ZKReplicationPeerStorage

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface ReplicationPeerStorage
    Perform read/write to the replication peer storage.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addPeer(String peerId, ReplicationPeerConfig peerConfig, boolean enabled)
      Add a replication peer.
      ReplicationPeerConfig getPeerConfig(String peerId)
      Get the peer config of a replication peer.
      boolean isPeerEnabled(String peerId)
      Test whether a replication peer is enabled.
      List<String> listPeerIds()
      Return the peer ids of all replication peers.
      void removePeer(String peerId)
      Remove a replication peer.
      void setPeerState(String peerId, boolean enabled)
      Set the state of peer, true to ENABLED, otherwise to DISABLED.
      void updatePeerConfig(String peerId, ReplicationPeerConfig peerConfig)
      Update the config a replication peer.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addPeer

        void addPeer(String peerId,
             ReplicationPeerConfig peerConfig,
             boolean enabled)
      throws ReplicationException
        Add a replication peer.
        抛出:
        ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

      • removePeer

        void removePeer(String peerId)
         throws ReplicationException
        Remove a replication peer.
        抛出:
        ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

      • setPeerState

        void setPeerState(String peerId,
                  boolean enabled)
           throws ReplicationException
        Set the state of peer, true to ENABLED, otherwise to DISABLED.
        抛出:
        ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

      • updatePeerConfig

        void updatePeerConfig(String peerId,
                      ReplicationPeerConfig peerConfig)
               throws ReplicationException
        Update the config a replication peer.
        抛出:
        ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

      • listPeerIds

        List<String> listPeerIds()
                  throws ReplicationException
        Return the peer ids of all replication peers.
        抛出:
        ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

      • isPeerEnabled

        boolean isPeerEnabled(String peerId)
               throws ReplicationException
        Test whether a replication peer is enabled.
        抛出:
        ReplicationException - if there are errors accessing the storage service.

        抛出:
